title: Black Shield vs Grievous Wounds items
body: So I've got a question that I'm not sure what's the answer. Does Morgana black shield stop status effects like grievous wounds from being applied from items that apply the status effect? Since Morg shield is meant to stop status effects like slow and such does that extend?

replies.body: It only prevents crowd control effects like slows, stuns, silences, etc. So it will not prevent grievous wounds.
